# PyEzTrace

> Lightweight Python tracing and logging with hierarchical output and an interactive viewer

Lightweight Python tracing and logging documentation for PyEzTrace.

## Documentation

- [Home](https://jeffersonaaron25.github.io/pyeztrace/index.md): Project overview and quick start.
- [Getting Started](https://jeffersonaaron25.github.io/pyeztrace/getting-started/index.md): Installation and initialization guide.
- [Usage](https://jeffersonaaron25.github.io/pyeztrace/usage/index.md): Tracing, logging, and viewer usage.
- [Configuration](https://jeffersonaaron25.github.io/pyeztrace/configuration/index.md): Configuration reference.
- [Contributing](https://jeffersonaaron25.github.io/pyeztrace/contributing/index.md): Contribution workflow.
